snippet: Would a new superdivision for college football and men’s basketball be a step toward ending the hypocrisy?
abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column notes that some of most powerful figures in college sports have begun to put forward idea he has long endorsed--shifting college teams to new, professional leagues; warns that proposal, which would only include the big five conferences for football and basketball, has several shortcomings, including lack of compensation for players.
lead_paragraph: Would a new superdivision for college football and men’s basketball be a step toward ending the hypocrisy?

headline.print_headline: The Plot to Rule College Sports
headline.main: The Plot to Rule College Sports
